entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 02:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: NW 49 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
